definition: (poetic) tranquil silence, run water over the ground to erode (soil), revealing the underlying strata and valuable minerals
details:
noun
- (poetic) tranquil silence
= synonyms: still, stillness
verb
- run water over the ground to erode (soil), revealing the underlying strata and valuable minerals
- wash by removing particles
- become quiet or still
- cause to be quiet or not talk
= synonyms: quieten, shut up, hush up, still, silence
- become quiet or quieter
= synonyms: quiet
